content.prompt:
George Grosz, “The Hero,” lithograph, 16 x 111/2.

© Estate of George Grosz/Licensed by VAGA, New York, NY

 

Which of the following best describes the lithograph above by German artist George Grosz?

choices.label: A propaganda poster prepared for the Nuremberg Rally by the Nazi Party
A protest poster against the atrocities of the atomic bomb
A representation of a Holocaust victim from Dachau
A post-First World War print expressing antiwar sentiment
A twentieth-century painting exemplifying the ideas of the Cubists

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
